Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32 bit

Problem(s):

Certain files and/or folders are not visible in my KSP install folder. For example, my save folder is not visible next to the "scenarios" and "training" folders in the saves folder, but I am still able to continue my saved games.

http://i.imgur.com/aYSqeYM.png

I can't find the log file.

http://i.imgur.com/4buCM29.png

FAR, enhanced navball, and Kerbinside don't appear to have any presence in the game even though they're installed properly, aside from the FAR aircraft showing up in the SPH. (I can see these files in the gamedata folder)

Mods:

Kerbal Engineer

Enhanced NavBall

FAR

KerbinSide

KWRocketry

KerbalKonstructs

Taurus HCV Capsule

The game seems to work perfectly fine aside from the plugins not working.

Welcome to the forums!

Certain folders have odd permissions settings that interfere with KSP, including Program Files and the Desktop. Copy and paste (not move) your KSP_win folder somewhere else, like C:\Games\.

See the Known Issues & Self-Help sticky for more information.
